lāvati：[= lāyati，lunāti lū] 刈る．ger．lāvitvā； caus．lāvayati，lavāpeti．

Lāvati，& Lāveti [the latter the usual form，as Caus．of lunāti．lāvati is the simple Pāli formation fr．lū．Another Caus．II．is lavāpati （q．v．）．See also lāyati] to cut，to mow PvA．40 （lāvitvā），Mhvs 10，30 （lāvayati）．（Page 583）

lāvati：လာဝတိ （√လူ）
ရိတ်၏။
